description: This seminar-style course focuses on a specific art-historical topic, and students learn how to pursue art-historical practice beyond the introductory level. Topics change with each offering. Prerequisite: at least one art history course or permission of the instructor. Offered periodically.
name: Top:Art Now/Critical Iss
prerequisites: Prerequisite: at least one art history course or permission of the instructor. Offered periodically.
title: Topics in Art History
